column3: The reordering makes it harder to see what actually changed in the text :(\n
Maybe just do it without the reordering?\n
What can I say, it is just two actual non-comment lines changed. :)\n

Yes, which would have been easier to see if the move and text change were separate commits.

Anyhow, these are the text changes:

``` patch

+++ b/src/main.h

@laanwj Fair enough; I'll split changes like that into two commits in the future.\n
